prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent: Promptbook is designed for non-programmers and non-technical people, leveraging version control systems like git while avoiding issues associated with binary formats, proprietary formats, or no-code solutions.

prompt.content:
You are experienced data researcher, detect the important keywords in the document.

# Rules

-   Write just keywords separated by comma

# The document

Take information from this document:

> {knowledgePieceContent}

promptResult.content: Promptbook, non-programmers, non-technical people, version control systems, git, binary formats, proprietary formats, no-code solutions
